macrodef macrocallinline .o-btn-back { background-color: #00000008; border-radius: 50%; padding: 0 0 5px; margin: 0 0 9px; display: block; box-shadow: 0 5px 20px #0000001f } .o-btn-back:hover { transform: scale(1.1); transition: transform 0.2s; } #stx-story-top { position: fixed; bottom: 3.2rem; right: 1.2rem; font-size: 24px; z-index: 899; } #stx-story-top button { width: 40px; height: 40px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; border: none; min-width: 1.5em; } #stx-story-top { } #stx-story-top:hover { transition: all 0.3s ease; } #stx-story-top .tc-btn-text { margin-left: 0.3em; vertical-align: middle; } #stx-story-top .tc-btn-invisible { font-size: 0.75em; } "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/modules/to-top/ui":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/modules/to-top/ui","text":" <$list filter="[[$:/StoryList]get[list]!is[blank]]">

"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/info/oeyoews":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/info/oeyoews","subtitle":"UserInfo","mask-closable":"yes","text":"coming "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/filteroperator/random.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/filteroperator/random.js","text":"/*\ title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/filteroperator/random.js type: application/javascript module-type: filteroperator a filter to show a tiddler @preserve \*/ !function(){"use strict";exports.random=function(n,t,r){var o,a=[],e=[],s=parseInt(t.operand||"1");for(isNaN(s)&&(s=1),n((function(n,t){e.push(t)}));s&&e.length;)o=Math.floor(Math.random()*e.length),a.push(e[o]),e.splice(o,1),s--;return a}}();","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"filteroperator"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/prevent-edit.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/prevent-edit.js","text":"/*\ title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/prevent-edit.js type: application/javascript module-type: startup 退出网页不提示 https://talk.tiddlywiki.org/t/prevent-prevent-leave-you-have-unsaved-changes/8192 \*/ exports.startup=function(){$tw.unloadTasks=$tw.unloadTasks.filter((t=>!t.toString().includes("confirmationMessage")))};","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"startup"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/style/custom-css":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/style/custom-css","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":"\define hide-tiddler-controls() [data-tiddler-title="$(currentTiddler)$"] .tc-titlebar h2 { text-transform: capitalize; } \end <$list filter="[!is[system]]"> <> <$list filter="[[$:/StoryList]get[list]count[]match[0]]"> .tc-tiddler-controls {display: none !important;} <$list filter="[[$:/temp/zen-mode]get[text]match[yes]]"> .gk0wk-notionpagebg, .nc-topbar { display: none !important; } [data-tiddler-title] .tc-tiddler-controls {display: none !important;} .custom-details { border-radius: 10px; padding: 0 10px; display: inline; color: #aaa; } .custom-details[open] { display: block; } .custom-details:not([open]):hover { transform: scale(1.1); transition: transform .2s; } .custom-details>summary { border-radius: 6px; background-color: transparent; margin-right: 2px; } .custom-details>summary::marker { content:""; } .o-neotw-setup .tc-modal, .o-neotw-setup .tc-modal-header, .o-neotw-setup .tc-modal-body, .o-neotw-setup .tc-modal-footer { border-radius: 10px; border: none; background-color: #F5F5F5; } .o-neotw-setup .tc-modal-footer { display:none; } .o-neotw-setup .tc-modal-header { text-transform: capitalize; }"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/style/tag-count":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/style/tag-count","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":".tc-tag-label:after { color: gray; opacity: calc(2/3); vertical-align: middle; } <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tags[]]" variable=tag> <$set name=cssTag filter="[escapecss[]]" select=0> [data-tag-title=<>] .tc-tag-label:after { content: " <$count filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag]" />"; } .tc-untagged-label:after { content: "<$count filter="[untagged[]!is[system]] -[tags[]]"/>"; } "},"$:/ContributionBanner":{"title":"$:/ContributionBanner","list-after":"$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/title","text":" \define base-github() https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw/edit/main/tiddlers/ \end <$set name="draft-of" value={{{ [get[draft.of]] }}}> <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/protocol}match[https:]]"> <$list filter="[[$:/config/OriginalTiddlerPaths]getindex]" variable="target" >
<<.icon "$:/core/images/star-filled">> Improving TiddlyWiki Documentation addprefix] }}} class="tc-tiddlylink-external" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">edit this tiddler on Gitlab
"},"GettingStarted":{"title":"GettingStarted","description":"tiddlywiki starter kit homepage","text":"{{sevenday}} {{tagpie}} {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/Readme}} <% if [{$:/info/url/protocol}match[https:]] %> {{heatmap}} <$cards filter='Videos JavaScript React TiddlyWiki Journal Tailwindcss books Article Private table-todo thoughts 名词' /> <% else %>
